info.title: Microsoft Marketplace Discovery API Keys Management
info.description: This API is designed to streamline the process of generating designated keys for accessing all Marketplace Catalog APIs. By utilizing a simple POST operation, users can effortlessly generate a unique API key, granting  access to Marketplace Catalog APIs from version 2023-01-01 and beyond.

post.summary: Generates an API key, granting access to the full range of Marketplace Catalog APIs. Please note that this API is currently in a preview state and requires sign-up to the 'Discovery Api Key Early Access' preview feature using a valid Azure subscription. For more information on this process please see the documentation for Marketplace Catalog APIs [here](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/marketplacecatalog/dataplane/products/get?view=rest-marketplacecatalog-dataplane-2023-05-01-preview&tabs=HTTP)

parameters.name: apiKeyAlias
parameters.description: Alias for new API Key. This alias must be unique and contain only alphanumeric characters separated by dashes.

parameters.name: x-ms-client-tenant-id
parameters.description: The tenant associated with the subscription.

200.description: Returns the newly created API key.

default.description: Microsoft.Marketplace error response describing why the operation failed.

post.summary: Revokes an active API key. Please note that this API is currently in a preview state and requires sign-up to the 'Discovery Api Key Early Access' preview feature using a valid Azure subscription. For more information on this process please see the documentation for Marketplace Catalog APIs [here](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/marketplacecatalog/dataplane/products/get?view=rest-marketplacecatalog-dataplane-2023-05-01-preview&tabs=HTTP)

parameters.name: apiKeyAlias
parameters.description: The alias of your API key.

parameters.name: x-ms-client-tenant-id
parameters.description: The tenant associated with the subscription.

200.description: Indicates that the API key was successfully revoked.

default.description: Microsoft.Marketplace error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary: Retrieves a list of API keys associated with a selected subscription. Please note that this API is currently in a preview state and requires sign-up to the 'Discovery Api Key Early Access' preview feature using a valid Azure subscription. For more information on this process please see the documentation for Marketplace Catalog APIs [here](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/marketplacecatalog/dataplane/products/get?view=rest-marketplacecatalog-dataplane-2023-05-01-preview&tabs=HTTP)

parameters.name: x-ms-client-tenant-id
parameters.description: The tenant associated with the subscription.

200.description: List of active keys that belong to the subscription.

default.description: Microsoft.Marketplace error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all of the available Microsoft.Marketplace REST API operations.

default.description: Microsoft.Marketplace error response describing why the operation failed.

ApiKey.description: ApiKey object containing both the key and its alias.

key.description: The API key to be used when calling relevant Discovery endpoints.
